shortDescription: Developed a feedback module that empowers users to create custom forms with dynamic questions.
description: Built the feature from scratch using PHP, JS, SQLite, and MariaDB, with each form having its own SQLite database housing reader-submitted data.
Created a H5mag Zapier app, allowing users to implement custom actions upon question submissions; widely adopted by multiple users.
Maintained and documented API endpoints for system stability and seamless integration.
Wrote comprehensive technical documentation for internal use and user onboarding, simplifying the adoption process.
Iteratively improved the module based on real user feedback, ensuring responsiveness to user needs.
Collaborated with designers and senior engineers to enhance user experience and adhere to established code standards.
Operated in a CI/CD environment for efficient and reliable deployment processes.
Provided direct customer support, addressing queries and issues promptly.

shortDescription: Developed a Magento 2 and Shopify plugin which makes the integration process with Squeezely easier.
description: Created a H5mag Zapier app, allowing users to implement custom actions upon question submissions; widely adopted by multiple users.
